title: VVits trenchmour in a conference had betwixt a scholler and an angler. Written by Nich Breton, Gentleman.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Printed by I. Robarts for N. Ling, and are to be sold at his shop at the VVest doore of Paules Church,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
